data.title: Minoxidil (International database)
data.meta_description: Minoxidil is a medicine available in a number of countries worldwide. A list of US medications equivalent to Minoxidil is available on the Drugs.com website.
data.text:
Minoxidil (International)

In the US, Minoxidil (minoxidil systemic) is a member of the drug class vasodilators and is used to treat High Blood Pressure.

Minoxidil

Minoxidil topical

Important Notice: The Drugs.com international database is in BETA release. This means it is still under development and may contain inaccuracies. It is not intended as a substitute for the expertise and judgement of your physician, pharmacist or other healthcare professional. It should not be construed to indicate that the use of any medication in any country is safe, appropriate or effective for you.
